# GREEN
# walk to the right
911	30011	100	30012	100
# walk to the left
912	30013	100	30014	100
# lie up
913	30021	100
# rolling up
914	30022	100	30023	100	30024	100	30025	100
# lie down
915	30031	100
# rolling down
916	30032	100	30033	100	30034	100	30035	100
# fly to the right
9111	300111	50	300112	50	300113	50	300114	50
# fly to the left
9112	300131	50	300132	50	300133	50	300134	50

# walk to the right

# walk to the left

923	30051	100
# rolling up
924	30052	100	30053	100	30054	100	30055	100
# lie down
925	30061	100
# rolling down
926	30062	100	30063	100	30064	100	30065	100
# fly to the right
9211	300411	50	300412	50	300413	50	300414	50
# fly to the left
9212	300431	50	300432	50	300433	50	300434	50
